title: 0.2 building from source
body_html:
0.2.0 doesn't build from source (0.1.12 does)

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/daniil/pytorch-0.2.0/torch/lib/ATen/gen.py", line 2, in <module>
import yaml
ImportError: No module named yaml
--
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:136 (message):
Failed to get generated_cpp list

— Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/daniil/pytorch-0.2.0/torch/lib/build/ATen/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".

The issue is that I have yaml

$ cat y_test.py
import yaml

$ python3 y_test.py
$

